CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper June 10, 1950, pg. 8, reads: "Future Sculptor - Leroy Smith, 2441 Waring Court, student at Herron Hill Junior High School, poses with the clay bust of a Roman soldier bedecked in gay-colored armor that he made as a 9-A student at the school. Mr. Walcheck is his instructor. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Herron Hill Junior High School student Leroy Smith holding his ceramic sculpture of Roman soldier, in domestic interior with radio in background
